title: Feel absolutely confused and heartbroken about #Neighbours
material_description: digital screen recording of @@mr_sjpatterson’s Twitter account
brief_description: Fans respond to the sad news that the soap Neighbours will be axed after nearly four decades. The UK’s Channel 5, the show’s biggest financial backer in recent years, has confirmed it will not renew the program. The hashtag #SaveNeighbours has been trending on social media since news broke.
